titles.title: E-85 Investment Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the incentives for E-85 fuel vehicle refueling property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/22/2007--Introduced. E-85 Investment Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to modify the tax credit for alternative fuel vehicle refueling property by: (1) increasing to 75% the rate of such credit for property using 85% ethanol fuel; (2) reducing the maximum dollar amount of such credit in 2013 and 2014 for ethanol-related refueling property; and (3) extending such credit through 2016 for ethanol-related refueling property.
